title: GettyAAT
creator: http://label.link/item/agent/admin
query: SELECT ?Subject ?prefLabel ?scopeNote { ?Subject a skos:Concept. ?Subject luc:term '$searchword' . ?Subject skos:inScheme aat: . ?Subject gvp:prefLabelGVP [xl:literalForm ?prefLabel]. OPTIONAL {?Subject skos:scopeNote [dct:language gvp_lang:en; rdf:value ?scopeNote]} . } ORDER BY ASC(LCASE(STR(?Term)))
